tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trains_safety_compliance_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_id INT,
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    inspector VARCHAR(100),
    inspection_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE SafetyCompliance (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    safety_rating VARCHAR(10),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    record_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE train_safety_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_id INT REFERENCES trains(id),
    safety_inspection_date DATE,
    safety_rating INT,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE infra_compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    infra_id INT REFERENCES infrastructure(infra_id),
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainSafetyRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    violation_type VARCHAR(50),
    violation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE InfrastructureSafetyRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    inspection_type VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainInfo (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_type VARCHAR(50),
    train_model VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InfrastructureInfo (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_address TEXT,
    last_inspection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    record_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
